properties.name: id
properties.description: Gets the ID of the page.

properties.name: title
properties.description: Gets or sets the title of the page.

properties.name: section
properties.description: Gets the section that contains the page.

properties.name: pageLevel
properties.description: Gets or sets the indentation level of the page.

properties.name: absolutePath
properties.description: The absolute path of the page. Read only

methods.name: getContents
methods.description: Gets the collection of PageContent objects on the page.

methods.name: addOutline
methods.description: Adds an Outline to the page at the specified position.
methods.signature: addOutline(left: double, top: double, html: String)

parameters.name: left
parameters.description: The left position of the top, left corner of the Outline.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: The top position of the top, left corner of the Outline.

parameters.name: html
parameters.description: An HTML string that describes the visual presentation of the Outline.

methods.name: insertPageAsSibling
methods.description: Inserts a new page before or after the current page.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location of the new page relative to the current page.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the new page.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
